reviews.review_msg: She is passionate. Very difficult marker. I understand the reason to be because she cares about her students. She wants students to come out of her class being able to critically think about important issues rather than rehearsing what is taught.

Run for your life with this one! She is an insanely hard marker... You may have spent a long time writing a coherent, insightful assignment but that will only get you 510,maybe a 5.510 if you're lucky. Lots of reading, lots of writing (even though it's not a W class), won't answer your questions. Run away, run away!
